website_summaries.verdict: These affordable acupressure sandals have hundreds of rubber nubs for a stimulating massage that effectively quells aches and pains.
pros: Small massage points don't feel overly invasive but still provide ample pressure
Effectively stimulates blood flow and releases tension
After a short break-in period, most owners find them comfortable enough to wear for hours on end
cons: Some owners report an unpleasant rubbery smell

customer_reviews.title: There isn't anything I liked about this product
customer_reviews.text: There isn't anything I liked about this product. I tried to return it and they say they are unreturnable. A pair of shoes it's not right. It doesn't even deserve a one-star. If you buy a product you should be able to return it within the 30-day period.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Acu-Reflex Massage Sandals
customer_reviews.text: First time I wore these I immediately felt them working. I had bought them at the ARE in Virginia Beach ten years ago. I've wore two pairs out over the past few years. I bought the last pair from Amazon. Happy to see they are still being sold. Good price and will be back to buy when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: StarDotter

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are wonderful. I wear high heels all the time and have developed plantar facitis. My husband also has plantar fascitis and these sandals are helping both of us. I highly recommend them. For days when you have been on your feet all day it is so comfortable to come home and put these sandals on. I love to just wear them around the house when I wash dishes or just lounge around. My husband looks forward to putting them on after work and he has noticed a huge difference. Treat yourself and get a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I love these sandals (& so does my dog)
customer_reviews.text: I have now purchased 4 pairs because I keep forgetting to put them out of reach of my dog who thinks they are the absolute best texture for chewing. For myself, the first day the nubs are kind of stiff but they soften up just enough very quickly. I now have a pair I keep at home (& will hopefully continue to remember to put them out of reach) and another pair I keep in my carry-on for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: CegAbq

customer_reviews.title: Love them. I have neuropathy due to type 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I have neuropathy due to type 2 diabetes and it has really been helping my feet. They are less numb than before I started using them.
customer_reviews.author: Smelker

customer_reviews.title: The size is a little bit off.
customer_reviews.text: This is the thrid time for me purchasing this brand of massage sandal. I wear a women's size 8 shoe. I ordered a size Medium. They would fit a woman with a size 10 foot. They still work for me to wear around the house, my intended purpose, and are great with winter socks. Fortunately they are somewhat adjustable due to the velcro strap, so they stay on. Just a bit long, so I need to be careful not to walk too fast or I could trip. I don't remember the size being of concern the last time I ordered these.
customer_reviews.author: Soft Skin Gal

customer_reviews.title: Arrived very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: I have only had these since yesterday afternoon, so I cannot give a 5 star. They seem ok. The fit is as stated, comfortable if you like stiff nubs on the bottom of your feet! We will see, I wore them today for half hour and did get used to the hard nobby surface.
customer_reviews.author: Lawana Barker

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Save your money. These spa?candles are so stiff, no flexibility. Worn once only & got several blisters. Waited too long to return. Tossed them because I wouldn't give anyone more pain.
customer_reviews.author: angel theodore

customer_reviews.title: Go for it!
customer_reviews.text: Feels great on my feet. Glad I read the reviews before I purchased for these do run large. I take a 7 1/2 usually order 8 but got the small which fits perfectly. The aroma is not pleasant however I'll leave them outside in the sun and see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: bonnie hunter

customer_reviews.title: I thought the nodules were a little bit higher on the arch since it was a "reflex massage sandals" like the one I bought from an
customer_reviews.text: I really needed this kind of slippers and it was so hard to find at the shops. I followed the reviews regarding sizing. I wear an 8 so I bought the M but it was too big for me. Way too big! I thought the nodules were a little bit higher on the arch since it was a "reflex massage sandals" like the one I bought from another country (which was only 6.50usd)but there was none. Apparently, it's just like a slider with nodules.
customer_reviews.author: hilda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the small amount they cost!
customer_reviews.text: For $20, they're great! Not the best quality and may not last for years, but I'm only using them at home and they're perfectly fine. The little nubs are perfect, not super hard, not too soft, but enough to really help tired feet. I would get them again. Like I said, for $20, u can't expect super high quality, some of the reviews are a little harsh. But I'm pretty happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: susan

customer_reviews.title: Great feel
customer_reviews.text: I love them. I love that they are adjustable and I love the support on my arches. I haven't been able to to wear them for more than a few hours but my feet and legs and even my lower back feel good after wearing them
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Well made slipper!
customer_reviews.text: Using sandpaper, I had to sand around all the edges that came in contact with my skin! It's a well made slipper, but the company could work on the fine touches.
customer_reviews.author: lionesspride

customer_reviews.title: ... many months now and find them to be very good. It only took a few days to get ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had these many months now and find them to be very good. It only took a few days to get used to them
customer_reviews.author: Mike  D

customer_reviews.title: Soothes aches and pain
customer_reviews.text: I bought these sandals for my grandson who is a professional dancer. Needless to say, he has a lot of problems with sore feet and arches. He told me he loves the sandals. They help with all the aches and pain he deals with on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Pamv

customer_reviews.title: Great for relieving pain
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended shiatsu sandals to deal w/ plantar fasciitis and I ordered these to be delivered on that same day. After two days of wear, the morning pain I've felt for 6 months was gone.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pérez

customer_reviews.title: Too large but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are comfortable, but I don't thing that I have the optimum fit. These seem to run on the large size. I wear men's 7.5 to 8 in casual shoes. The would have opt for the small if I knew better. Btw, this item cannot be returned or exchanged. Be nice if they provided a scaled silhouette or outline of the foot bed that we could print out.
customer_reviews.author: N.B.

customer_reviews.title: Best alternative to Adissage
customer_reviews.text: I love Adissage sandals but am sick of its poor quality and picking up the small black pieces as they start breaking off within a few weeks. This is the best alternative I found to them. Going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Amit Agarwal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I now wear these, as my daily around the house sandals. I did not rate them with 5 stars, as they tend to cause my feet to become very dry, in spite of the fact that I put lotion, on my feet twice a day. I find them to be very comfortable, but a bit on the big side, so be careful when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Only last about a year
customer_reviews.text: I only wear these inside as slippers and usually only in summer. On the right sandal, the horseshoe shaped insert on the bottom of the heel started peeling off and I had to glue it back on. Hopefully is stays as the rest of the sandal seems to be in OK shape. They are comfortable but take a bit of getting used to.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very Disappointed, it was described that it was a little bigger than my size and ordered down, well it did not fit! Too small too uncomfortable. Be careful because I went in to return and it did not let me. Will never order shoes from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Cuello

customer_reviews.title: Just a sandal
customer_reviews.text: These type of therapy sandals are supposed to be a little uncomfortable only to be worn for short periods of time. I didn't think these really did the job. They didn't seem to add anything special to my foot therapy. I wasn't going to buy the $60 Adidas version but maybe it would actually do something and be more than just another shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Becca jo

customer_reviews.title: Great, once you get used to them
customer_reviews.text: At fist the "massage" surface was a little uncomfortable. But , after a couple of days, my poor achy feet got to like it. I'm glad I stuck it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love em! Very comfortable! Great transaction! Great price for such a good shoe! Thanks for a great buy one experience!
customer_reviews.author: Miss Kitty

customer_reviews.title: I don't do many reviews but I had to share that it's worth it to walk on these bad boys. There's no doubt in my mind that ...
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely incredible and authentic in terms of the description. I don't do many reviews but I had to share that it's worth it to walk on these bad boys. There's no doubt in my mind that these increase neurofeedback and firing in the brain and stimulate the meridians and intricate foot muscles.
customer_reviews.author: Bexibar

customer_reviews.title: Recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: It needs a bit getting used to (first few days) but afterwards it great for your feet. I wear them all the time, mainly when I work in the kitchen and it has helped a lot.
customer_reviews.author: RAH

customer_reviews.title: Nice sandals
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable enough to wear for about an hr the first day. Good quality for my needs. Would probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's is okay not enough pressure to relive the foot pain ☹️
customer_reviews.author: Akanksha mehra

customer_reviews.title: The real size.
customer_reviews.text: My shoe size is 8.5, but this sandals does not match with the size chart, it's bigger. You can see the difference. Sadly it's can't be return or exchange for a smaller one.
customer_reviews.author: Jesmies

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My favorite, comfortable, supportive, cheap, spa, around the house/yard Sandal.
customer_reviews.author: Readers And Healers

customer_reviews.title: Massages sore tired feet
customer_reviews.text: Wearing and walking in them after hours on your feet in regular shoes does massage and make the bottom of your feet feel better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value for inexpensive acupressure slides
customer_reviews.text: Helps with my plantar fasciitis and my tired feet at end of the day. The only problem is the pair I ordered are too large, (so order size down), but after wearing them I didn’t want to be without them to return. Will eventually order a smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Lizanne Blair

customer_reviews.title: Crappy painful flops
customer_reviews.text: I have neuropathy my feet kill me in these shoes my feet are blood red just from wearing to the store had to put paper towels between toes and shoes have blisters on top of feet do not buy and of course they are not returnable what a waste of money
customer_reviews.author: alice mccutchen

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable After A Few Days
customer_reviews.text: I like the massage feeling I get when wearing these sandals around the house as slippers. It took about 3 days for the prickly nubs to feel comfortable under my feet.
customer_reviews.author: LaTonyaBKR

customer_reviews.title: Works great on a Plantar Facsitis feet
customer_reviews.text: Good blood circulation, once used to it, it feels very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Harish A.

customer_reviews.title: If you like these kind of massage sandals for therapeutic reasons - ...
customer_reviews.text: If you like these kind of massage sandals for therapeutic reasons - these are wimpy, sorry but true and there is no arch.
customer_reviews.author: emma

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to replace an old pair of Addidas slippers of similar design. They are comfortable and fit as expected. Would recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: latinlaw

customer_reviews.title: prickly
customer_reviews.text: Much more prickly than I expected! Have to wear footies with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No returns
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are so uncomfortable they are painful when wearing. The little nubs are so hard compared to the Adidas brand. The worst part is you cannot return the sandals. Do not buy these sandals. Buy the Adidas ones
customer_reviews.author: Pek

customer_reviews.title: Wrong sizing
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are horrible. Also the sizing is actually a women's 8-10 (according to packaging on shoes) and much closer to 10+.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes started falling apart about a month after I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them. No adjusting period. Thinking about buying another and I just received them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $20!!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. Plastic sandals that are not worth $20. I can’t believe it’s a nonreturnable item!
customer_reviews.author: Aracelly Izquierdo

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart at the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I loved these until they begun to become up glued at the bottom. I have attempted to glue and even tape back together.....ugh!
customer_reviews.author: rodney lewis

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They look cheap, but my daughter loves them. Size was prefect.
customer_reviews.author: Sassy66

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not well made
customer_reviews.text: Fit and comfort very good. However, I am disappointed that the sandals are already falling apart. The traction strip on the heal has already fallen off.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Stec

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Sandler’s did help with foot pain However the bottom of them came apart within a few weeks off Amazon gave me a refund but would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much firmer than Adissage!
customer_reviews.text: Just got these and really pleased! Firmer than Adissage. Hope they last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Niffari Poorman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE THESE
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy them! They do NOT massage the soles of the feet. They are rock hard and just plain HURT. Also not eligible for return. Very, very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Barb McInvaille

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my wife. She loves them. I used to borrow them so much that she got me my own.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Watson

customer_reviews.title: good reviews on these were misleading
customer_reviews.text: bought these for Christmas gifts for people and am told they are too painful to be worn
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: did not last long
customer_reviews.text: after 2 months of just walking around inside my home, with hard wood floors and some carpeting, part of the bottom fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: They came undone at the bottom after one day of wear. My feet also started sweating.
customer_reviews.author: Lynette

customer_reviews.title: I really tried to like them. but they felt like I was stepping ...
customer_reviews.text: I really tried to like them. but they felt like I was stepping on hundreds of thorns. I had to return them
customer_reviews.author: cha111

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Very cheezy and flimsey sandals with a NO RETURN policy.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Hensleigh

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for price, but extremely strong rubbery petroleum smell. Airing out did not help.
customer_reviews.author: EsseDee

customer_reviews.title: MY GO TO SANDALS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The sandals Greatly improved the aches and pains in my feet. No longer painful to walk! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: uiy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: I looked for something like this for ages after my Australian pair gave out. The nubs are high enough and strong enough to give my feet a great massage whenever I walk in them. Could be too strong for the tender-footed, but a pair of old socks will remedy that. I won't walk around the house/yard without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J Dowell

customer_reviews.title: slightly painful without socks
customer_reviews.text: they seem to give a nice feel without socks but get tired after a few hours with sock I can ware them most the day
customer_reviews.author: Scott W. Hegel

customer_reviews.title: My fault
customer_reviews.text: They are what I ordered however they hurt the bottom of my feet after I wear them over a period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Imogene Compher

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Most uncomfortable sandals I've ever purchased. Would NOT suggest purchasing these. Plus there is NO RETURN AVAILABLE
customer_reviews.author: Mary Clemons

customer_reviews.title: Stick with them - they do work!!
customer_reviews.text: It took me about 3 days to adjust to these but since then, they are my go to sandals as soon as I get in the house.
customer_reviews.author: LPG

customer_reviews.title: comfortable massaging sandals
customer_reviews.text: I've found them to be better than the higher priced brand-name sandals (where the nubs break off after a while)
customer_reviews.author: Gary C.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: At first it was like POKEY POKEY, then finally it settled down to just comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: NorwayNick

customer_reviews.title: Not strong enough for beach wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for Aruba vacation, used around the house for a week. Then vacation. After 2 days on beach in Aruba the right heel came off. 2 days later the left came off.
customer_reviews.author: David G Royack

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect if you need foot stimulation to fend off plantar fasciitis. Love these
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great way to walk
customer_reviews.text: So far they are doing great.....a little each day goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Simonsen

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my daughter who loves them. She says they are so comfortable and help her feet very much. She feels a major difference.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Rose

customer_reviews.title: She says they work very well and she's very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: Got them for my wife as a Christmas present. She says they work very well and she's very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Marty A. McNeely

customer_reviews.title: Run large. I got women's medium and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Run large. I got women's medium and they are way to big for 7 1/2 ... should have ordered smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It said that I received it Friday but I don't have it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: I liked these sandals until the flap detached from the Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I liked these sandals until the flap detached from the Velcro. Tried to fix it twice with epoxy. No luck. I'm pretty little, so I think this would be a problem for bigger folks and anyone who puts more wear and tear on. Too bad -- I liked them otherwise and wish they had lasted longer!
customer_reviews.author: Susan E. Clapp

customer_reviews.title: Very good circulation
customer_reviews.text: Indeed a healthy massage reflexology sandals. I wear it everyday, and during the first few days my feet were not used to it, a bit of pain feeling, so I wear a socks underneath. But few days later I am able to wear it bare feet. It had improved my blood circulation and strengthen my feet. I really love this! And after wearing it for a longer period of time, it treated my ball of foot pain. So I am returning to write another review here to update my satisfactory feeling. I hope to give it a 10 stars.
customer_reviews.author: It's me :)

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: The Medium is huge. It feels like I am wearing swimming flippers. There is no arch support. Very disappointing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Here is the image of the insert that comes with the product.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, relaxing
customer_reviews.text: I keep trying every massage sandal that exists because my feet hurt constantly. I've found only very FEW that work (for me), and Thank God these are one of them. Thank you so much for making these, they help me. Comfortable, relaxing, and in my opinion -they feel much better than the Adidas massage sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Hendrickson

customer_reviews.title: Miss sized -- I ordered the size I usually wear ...
customer_reviews.text: Miss sized -- I ordered the size I usually wear in this type of sandal -- these were falling off my feet, They also have little to no arch support and they stink! I was going to return them but it said they could not be returned. It does NOT say that anywhere on the product page or order. However, Amazon did refund me the money. Guess the sandals will now go to Goodwill -- maybe somebody can use them.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Worrell

customer_reviews.title: freakin loooooove these
customer_reviews.text: they do hurt for the first few days but as someone with plantar fasciitis, i could not ask for a better shoe. before these i was unable to wear anything other than my normal walking shoes but i can wear these all day if i choose to. they relieve a lot of my foot cramps and general discomfort of my condition. planning on getting a closed-toed version of these for work. thank you
customer_reviews.author: Doodlebop

customer_reviews.title: Great for foot pain!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for pain management (not fashion) and I don't wear these outside, so I can't really attest to how they'd hold up with "street" use, but I wear them every day around my home. I love these! The nubs feel great (to me) especially when I get aches in my feet. I would definitely buy these again, although I might consider a smaller size as these are a little long for my foot (but since I only wear them as a slipper, it doesn't really matter)
customer_reviews.author: H. P. Stone

customer_reviews.title: They feel good on the feet.
customer_reviews.text: Look like cheap plastic sandals, and are a little uncomfortable at first, but after wearing them for a few hours each day they did make my feet feel better, so I gave them 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for pain relief!
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are the best for standing on my feet all day working. I was using my sneakers for 1/2 the day then switching to these, but I found that if I wear these with socks my feet are much better off. I've been suffering for years trying to find something for my feet, these sandals have helped tremendously but won't be ideal for winter.
customer_reviews.author: KimmieC

customer_reviews.title: Love them, but beware, they run extremely large
customer_reviews.text: I do love these sandals. Someone had commented on them running large, so instead of ordering the large that I would normally wear, I ordered medium. Even those were too large, so i gave them to my husband and ordered small. They fit much better. I have started wearing these around the house all the time. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Evans

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: I received the slippers today but I am very unhappy with them. The shoes don’t have any pressure like it described in Amazon. I need to return my slippers and get a refund please. These suck! When I tried to return them, they wouldn’t let me. How can I return them? These are not beneficial in any which way.
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: they seem pretty good. I cannot feel the little spiky things ...
customer_reviews.text: For the price, they seem pretty good. I cannot feel the little spiky things like I could on the Old Friends sandals I use to buy (no longer available in my size), but thought I'd try them before forking over $100 for a pair of Kenkohs. Only time will tell how long they hold up.
customer_reviews.author: A.M. Murray

customer_reviews.title: OK for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of this brand. The first pair lasted 13 months of constant use in the house or a quick run to the shop. The straps pulled out from the shoe base and the bottom tread came unglued as others have mentioned. I felt they lasted long enough for the lower price to purchase again. I have had this type of sandal for 30 years. The Adidas brand did last longer, though many of the nubs broke off or bent over, reducing the effectiveness of the massage.
customer_reviews.author: sfs

customer_reviews.title: I love these and for the price they are great.
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair that I have purchased. When I am home this is all I wear. Love them. I wish they would make some that I could wear outside of the house a little more stylist.
customer_reviews.author: n

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: A masculine looking sandal. Feels great when walking. Comfy on feet. True to size and the Velcro closure around toe area, is great for adjusting to narrow or wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: BAEFL

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Rubber points are superior to the more popular plastic ones which are prone to detach more easily. Slip on slippers with Velcro strap are my favorite because you can adjust them and they can be used with or without socks.
customer_reviews.author: DT

customer_reviews.title: Not the same as the first pair
customer_reviews.text: The first pair I bought were a 5 star but the 2nd pair were a harder material and feel uncomfortable . I really wish these manufacturers were more consistent in production .
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Sandals free really great. I gave it three stars because the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Sandals free really great. I gave it three stars because the inside of the sandal that touches the top of my foot is rough and feels very unpleasant.
customer_reviews.author: Tried and True

customer_reviews.title: Need to be softer
customer_reviews.text: Easy on and off which that’s what I was looking for. “Nubbs” are a little to hard and they hurt if you don’t have socks on..
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and good quality
customer_reviews.text: They are comfortable and stimulate the circulation of the feet helping me after a strong day. They are good quality. I recommend them
customer_reviews.author: Ana Figueroa Ramos

customer_reviews.title: They really have giving me a good massage to my feet and legs.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light and feel good when you walk. I wear them with socks or without. I've noticed that my legs feel better at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Flap broke after wearing a while...
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift back in July, they are already broken and I'm not even sure when it happened, am a little disappointed. It's only been 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like these but I wear them with socks
customer_reviews.text: I like these but I wear them with socks. Too hard on my tender feet. Wearing them with sock is good.
customer_reviews.author: bearoy

customer_reviews.title: They work well
customer_reviews.text: They work well, wish they had nubs where the heal is instead of the smooth circle. Otherwise they work well for relaxing my feet after being on them all day.
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Green

customer_reviews.title: Love these things !
customer_reviews.text: As a cyclist growing up there was a company that made these years ago and I went through multiple pairs of them through the years.... I was excited to find these and wear them every day around the house....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were comfortable enough to stand on for about 30 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes were comfortable enough to stand on for about 30 minutes. It provided some feet pressure relief. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: kclee33

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy
customer_reviews.text: I reordered these after my old pair got lost. They are super comfy slip ons. The nubs are softer than the name brand ones so they are more comfortable for me.
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing Massage Sandals
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive them. They felt good on my feet and I was wearing them daily. After 2 weeks, the sandals began to fall apart. I had to return. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: S. Lester

product_meta.title: Acu-Reflex Massage Sandals. 1 Pair. ReflexologySandals. Acu-Shiatsu Sandals (S (Women 6-7))
product_meta.description: Size:S (Women 6-7)The Wholistic art of reflexology is based on the theory that applying pressure to specific points on the feet hands or ears will release blocked energy. Our Acu Shiatsu sandals have 100's of little rubber points that massage nerve endings. Why would anyone choose regular sandals when they can enjoy a mini shiatsu treatment when walking or even standing?
feature_bullets: Applies pressure on your feet which releases blocked energy
Enjoy a mini shiatsu treatment when walking or even standing
